head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BAINTON, ELIZABETH ANN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BAINTON, ELIZABETH ANN

block.p: BAINTON-Elizabeth Ann, 34. Of Greenwich, CT. on Feb. 2, 1998. Daughter of Donald J. and Aileen M. Bainton. Sister of Kathryn C. Sarka, Stephen L. and William D. Bainton. A Mass of Christian burial will be held Saturday, February 7th, at 11 A.M., at St. Catherine of Siena Church, 4 Riverside Avenue, Riverside, CT. Burial will follow in Putnam Cemetery, Greenwich, Conn. There are no calling hours. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the Mother Theresa Missionaries of Charity, 335 East 145 Street, Bronx, New York 10451. Leo P. Gallagher & Son Funeral Home, Greenwich, Connecticut.
